author: ahinzmann
body:
#### PR description:

Make #31213 run for era 'run2_miniAOD_80XLegacy' (for which the ECFs do not exist in NanoAOD).
Reordering the modifiers to make this work.

#### PR validation:

runTheMatrix.py -l 136.7722,1329.1

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
no
title: Remove duplicate ECF variables (fix old eras)
